summary: Cleans up the messy dining table at Fort Dawnguard
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]Fort Dawnguard Dining Table Cleaned[/size][/center]




[b][size=3]Description[/size][/b]

I always wondered why the main dining table of Fort Dawnguard was such a mess, every other room of the fort looks somewhat organized except that table.
Even in the official Dawnguard trailer the dining table looks fine... so what happened?
This mod aims to clean up the dining table and add bunch of different drinks and foods for the vampire hunters to enjoy. I mainly used similar items and foods which were also found in the other rooms of the fort.
I'm aware that there are other mods which clean up the dining table but they all seem to overhaul the entire fort more or less. I needed a mod which only cleans up the dining table so I made this and decided to share it with you guys :)



[b][size=3]Installation[/size][/b]

There are 2 versions you can choose from (hey, you gotta have options). Initially I made the table cluttered with food and drinks then later I thought maybe
I should cut back a bit. So in the end I decided to add a less cluttered option.

Simply download either option you prefer and drop the .esp file into your Data folder and activate it from SkyrimLauncher.

If you have recently visited Fort Dawnguard and then activated this mod, the table will most likely still look like a mess since the old assets are still there.
You can either wait for a few days until the cell resets and the old items on the table disappear.
Or you can use the console command "resetinterior xx001dba" (without quotation marks). You need to replace the "xx" with the number which dawnguard is at in your load order, for example it's fourth in my load order so it's "04001dba" for me.
I also recommend you take any items you might have stored somewhere in the fort before using this console command.


[b][size=3]Uninstallation[/size][/b]

Delete the .esp file


[size=3][b]Compatibility[/b][/size]

Obviously it will conflict with any other mod that changes or adds anything to the dining table at Fort Dawngurd.


[b][size=3]Requirements[/size][/b]

Dawnguard DLC


[size=3][b]Version[/b][/size]

1.0 - Intial Release
1.1 - Added couple of candlesticks on the table of less cluttered version.


[b][size=3]Notes[/size][/b]

Cleaned with TES5EDIT (Just in case)
author: MrPaladin
